cocktails.title: 50/50 gibson
cocktails.description: vodka grey goose, cherry tomato & vermouth
cocktails.flavors: dry noilly prat. dry, with a Mediterranean touch.

cocktails.title: paloma spritz
cocktails.description: tequila blanco cazadores, elderflower liqueur st. germain, lime, smoked grapefruit, sour beer & soda.
cocktails.flavors: floral, citric & pleasantly smoky. bubbly and cheerful.

cocktails.title: hicky coco punch
cocktails.description: beet & green apple shrub, lemon sorbet, aged rum santa teresa, martini ambrato vermouth, patxaran & lemon. all clarified with coconut milk.
cocktails.flavors: vegan, sweet & the boss's favorite, period.

cocktails.title: torrija
cocktails.description: limoncello, manzanilla de sanlúcar, olive leaf, eristoff vodka, lemon, olive oil & egg white.
cocktails.flavors: creamy, with citric and bitter notes.

cocktails.title: carrotcake garibaldi
cocktails.description: campari, carrot juice, carrot cake foam & lemon essential oil.
cocktails.flavors: not much else to say, you have to try it.

cocktails.title: astoria
cocktails.description: dewar's white label scotch whisky, moscatel, white port, rose petals & apricot, angostura.
cocktails.flavors: for manhattan lovers with a little twist.

cocktails.title: duquesa isabel
cocktails.description: sherry blend (manzanilla de sanlúcar & amontillado), jasmine tea, martini white vermouth, house tonic.
cocktails.flavors: fresh & mineral, with saline touches & pleasantly bitter.

cocktails.title: philly vic punch
cocktails.description: aged rum santa teresa, caramelized peach, red port, peach liqueur, darjeeling tea & lemon.

cocktails.title: southside bumb
cocktails.description: gin bombay dry, peppermint, cucumber, spiced syrup from jerez palomino fino, orange sherbet, water cordial & soda.
cocktails.flavors: better than a mojito, fresher, greener, cooler.

cocktails.title: la última palabra
cocktails.description: mezcal union, green chartreuse, maraschino, lime, pineapple foam & red pepper.

cocktails.title: piston
cocktails.flavors: unusual mix of flavors with coffee notes.

cocktails.title: Tommy's mescalita
cocktails.description: mezcal unión, cazadores white tequila, agave & lime

cocktails.title: gin fino basil smash
cocktails.description: bombay dry gin, fino sherry wine, basil & lemon

cocktails.title: penicillin
cocktails.description: dewar's white label whiskey, lapsang tea, ginger & lemon

vinosNaturales.title: la figa
vinosNaturales.description: red, light and fresh, from garnacha & corognan grape of pau and rabós.

vinosNaturales.title: panorama
vinosNaturales.description: white from the limoux area, light, aromatic and very plesant mouthfill, fills without cloying.

vinosNaturales.title: mandarines
vinosNaturales.description: orange wine from destemmed garnacha blanca.

vinosNaturales.title: blublub
vinosNaturales.description: sparkling wine of a single fermentation, xarel.lo 100% from the ros marina family in font-rubi, penedés.

vinosNaturales.title: virra
vinosNaturales.description: made with the grape skins and refermented with must.
